Articles.Content:
Hey guys,I just found blender and played around with it like days ago,And then BOOM I had this idea. So below you will see pictures that'll blow your mind!

Duna All Alone:

Duna + KSP Logo: (Wallpapers,backgrounds people!)

Duna + Text

Duna + Everything

P.S Btw If you want this as your wallpaper/background but you want to resize it, go resize the render with your very own .DAE Files! (Cuz Ill know youll ask! Just dont pass this off as your own! Or trouble! Ill get my Jebs to take you away! :cool:Stealer-><-Stealer:cool:

Duna Text -> http://www./?kpbm7ngpdvq0jx4

Duna -> http://www./?xx41swvhkcsd4cd

Thanks To Blender for making this possible!

Edited August 5, 2013 by BigBoy734

Nice; never really thought of duna having clouds!

Edited September 18, 2014 by IWantSumCrusha

If Duna is like Mars; History-wise. This is Duna before it got hit by a Meteor.

Aso: Nice work, It looks awesome!

This is awesome

I think the clouds aren't necessary since all of the H2o on Duna is frozen and covered by frozen Co2.
I like the clouds but I think they should be more wispy, as Duna's atmosphere could never support clouds like that. Maybe also on the dark side of the terminator line, make it black rather than blue.

Looks nice! However, like some people said, the clouds should be a bit thinner... LUCKILY, I have a thinner cloud layer map from a previous project!

You are free to use this!

Looks nice! However, like some people said, the clouds should be a bit thinner... LUCKILY, I have a thinner cloud layer map from a previous project!

You are free to use this!

Thanks! Ill prolly use this for others.

Also perhaps the clouds should be orange/rust colored to be like one of the massive martian dust storms as I'm fairly sure that there are no clouds of vapor on mars

(I may be wrong).
I love this! This is going as my background right now. I do have to say though, slight criticism, I don't like the "Duna" Writing

DUDE

You left your mouse on it!

DUDE

You left your mouse on it!

Wut, I didn't see any mouse, and that's something not worthy of getting upstet about.

It scared the chips outta me because when it was full screen I was like

AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!

I just tried something like this and I was wondering did you use the color map on the official wiki like this?

No clouds or stars though like yours I still need to get round to that.

Also how long did you take making yours ?

Edited August 5, 2013 by ixolate industries

I just tried something like this and I was wondering did you use the color map on the official wiki like this?

No clouds or stars though like yours I still need to get round to that.

Also how long did you take making yours ?

A few hours cuz I had to find the tools and such to making it. And yes I did use the color map and some bump map of duna,I forget where though.

It scared the chips outta me because when it was full screen I was like

AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!

Trolololo.... Ill remove it using precise aiming!

Or just putting black over it...

Okay I removed it in the main post.

Edited August 5, 2013 by BigBoy734
I'd like to use this as artwork for my ksp lets-fly series. any problem there? need me to credit you in the description?
Good but clouds and Duna's words shadow are too much, with clouds, it doesn't looks like Duna at all, I want my Duna back !!!!
